spatial_accuracy.notes: Major deviations from the 2D plan. Overall footprint/jogs do not match (plan has multiple offsets around dining/kitchen; render simplifies the perimeter). Room layout only loosely resembles living/dining/kitchen adjacency; the top-right space is modeled as a bedroom-like room instead of the labeled playroom. Interior partitions around foyer/closets/WC/pantry are largely incorrect or absent. Door locations/orientations are mostly not represented (openings are generic). Window placements and counts do not match the plan.

structural_fidelity.notes: Wall thickness appears visually consistent, but structural layout fidelity is low: several plan-defined rooms are missing (pantry, WC, closets/foyer organization), and at least one hallucinated room function/element appears (bedroom). Adjacency relationships are wrong in the entry/service core (foyer-closet-WC-stair/pantry cluster). Door embedding is simplified; many plan doors are not modeled as doors.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture does not map to the plan intent: the plan indicates a playroom, but the render includes a bed (not in plan). Kitchen fixtures (sink/cooktop placements) do not clearly match the plan’s counters/appliance layout. Living/dining furniture is plausible but not plan-accurate. Scale is generally consistent, but placement accuracy is weak.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Clean isometric-style render with readable geometry and decent lighting. However, it is not a strict orthographic/isometric technical match to the plan (camera/projection feels more perspective than true axonometric). Composition is clear, with minimal artifacts.

detected_errors.description: Exterior footprint/proportions distorted: plan’s multiple perimeter jogs (notably around dining bump-out and kitchen/right-side offsets) are simplified/incorrect in the 3D render.
Missing pantry room (center area in plan labeled PANTRY is not present as an enclosed space in the 3D render).
Missing W/C (small toilet room near the stair/closet zone in plan is not represented).
Missing/incorrect closet/foyer partitioning: the plan’s foyer and two closet areas are not modeled with correct walls/doors.
Top-right room is misplaced/misdefined: plan shows a PLAYROOM, but the 3D render models a bedroom-like space in that location.
Hallucinated element: a bed appears in the 3D render despite no bedroom shown in the provided 2D plan.
Interior wall alignment errors in the entry/service core (around stairs/closets/WC/pantry): partition layout does not follow the 2D plan.

Incorrect/missing door placements: multiple plan doors (foyer entry door, WC door, closet doors, pantry door, and indicated openings) are not shown or are represented as generic openings without correct location/orientation.
Window placement mismatch: the number and positions of windows on exterior walls do not correspond to the plan’s window locations (living/playroom/kitchen sides differ).
Kitchen layout mismatch: counters/appliance placements (sink/cooktop runs and openings) do not align with the plan’s kitchen counter configuration.
